metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3190 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The fill_xrgb32_lerp_opaque_spans function in cairo-image-compositor.c in cairo before 1.14.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via a negative span length.

criterions.comment: cairo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
